children.text: Stay confident knowing that it is working to keep you feeling comfortable and looking great all day.
George is a one-stop range for men who want to look good effortlessly, and brings timeless, masculine looks updated with contemporary styling.
For men who want to look good effortlessly George is a one-stop range. It brings timeless, virile looks updated with contemporary styling.
An ideal choice for lounging or when you're on the go.
It will suit you ideally when you're on the go or lounging.
Here it is the dress that fits in everywhere.
Stay cool and comfortable in this dress.
Step into this gorgeous dress which will be sure to turn heads.
It’s a cinch to update your style with this  dress—one that moves through your day effortlessly.

thenExpression.text: It is suitable to wear for a wide range of casual events.
